thread.title: Brooke
thread.title_full: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance reviewed by Brooke

author: Brooke
title: Brooke
text: I have had Pet's Best insurance for about 2 1/2 years and about 7 months ago my dog, Murphy, was diagnosed with Lymphoma. They made an awful situation easier. There were never any delays in payments, I had the reimbursement back in my checking account within one week. All of his office visits and chemotherapy treatments are covered at 100% and he was even renewed with full coverage for his cancer and chemo treatments. The staff at Pet's Best is so caring and helpful. I cannot say enough about how wonderful the entire company has been to me and Murphy throughout this horrible diagnosis.
